alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 6:31PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Phillips and west central Valley Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 631 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles east of Malta to 7 miles south of Saco. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... The Bentonite Plant and Content. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley
